data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rivera, Julio, Vergara-Cobián, Clorinda (2017): A checklist of the praying mantises of Peru: new records, one new genus (Piscomantis gen. n.) and biogeographic remarks (Insecta, Mantodea). Zootaxa 4337 (3): 361-389, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4337.3.3|270 occurrences
